name: TERRA (Game On!)
description:
You're in a spooky forest... 🌳🌳🌳

Collect items to help you, take on enemies, and find your friends!

CONTROLS

Keyboard: 

  • WAD keys to move / jump
  • Space to shoot 

Touchscreen/mouse: 

  • Tap to move / jump
  • Double tap to shoot

A game designed by the Game On! group

Over two months of weekly sessions a group of about 15 young people & youth workers from Young Peoples Futures got together to play, make, and learn all about video games, with games design specialists from Biome Collective & Tinderbox Collective! Together they came up with their own interactive & playful ideas; created art, sound effects and music; and designed several games (both digital & physical/paper-based) along the way - including this side-scrolling action platformer, Terra. The project was supported and hosted by Articulate.

Tinderbox Collective / Biome Collective / Young Peoples Futures / Articulate
